channel.title: Reminders on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Reminders on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: iOS 26: Add New Reminders Faster Than Ever
item.description: In iOS 26, currently in beta, creating a new task for Apple’s Reminders app is now a much faster process, thanks to the introduction of a “New Reminder” control that lets you create tasks without ever

item.title: iOS 26: Add New Reminders Faster Than Ever
